title: Que Dodging
body: So, it keeps making me leave during champion selection even though I chose a champ and now I have to wait due to queue dodging even though I didn't... What's up with that? I chose a champ, it doesn't get banned in draft pick, why then am I kicked and given a queue dodging penalty? kind of bs. I have a champ selected, trying to fix my runes and then I get kicked and penalised.

replies.body: Are you locking in the champion? You need to lock in a champion in draft pick and ranked, or it counts as a dodge.

*Queue

It's a wonky word, I know.
I just remember it's spelt like kwey-wey :)
